publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2408 Shona Robison: City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regenerationâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the city of Dundee on achieving an Award for Best Practice in Regeneration and notes that Dundee was the only winning project from Scotland; further congratulates the Dundee Partnership who were involved in the work leading up to this award, and calls on the Scottish Executive to build on this work through its review of the cities by recognising the crucial role which Dundee plays in the Scottish economy as a regional economic centre and by taking positive steps to assist the city in combating the negative impact of de-population.

S1M-2408 City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regeneration (lodged on 6 November 2001) Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Irene McGugan*, Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Andrew Wilson*, Bruce Crawford*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-2408 City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regeneration (lodged on 6 November 2001) Richard Lochhead*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2408 City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regeneration (lodged on 6 November 2001) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2408 City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regeneration (lodged on 6 November 2001) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-2408 City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regeneration (lodged on 6 November 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2408 City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regeneration (lodged on 6 November 2001) Robin Harper*
S1M-2408 City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regeneration (lodged on 6 November 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2408 City of Dundee and Award for Best Practice in Regeneration (lodged on 6 November 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*
